description: Discover the intersection of open source licensing models and blockchain technology. Explore how blockchain's decentralized architecture aligns with open source principles and the unique challenges it presents. This article covers various licensing models such as permissive, copyleft, dual, and customized licenses applicable to blockchain projects, along with real-world cases like Ethereum and Hyperledger, and their implications for the future.
keywords: open source, blockchain, licensing models, MIT License, Apache License, GPL, copyleft, permissive licenses, dual licensing, Ethereum, Hyperledger, decentralized technology
title: Exploring Open Source Licensing Models in the Blockchain Era
